page.title: 06HEALTH
page.content:
THERE IS NO HEALTH CENTRE IN THE VILLAGE BUT THERE ARE GOOD SURGERIES IN LITCHAM AND SWAFFHAM WHICH SERVE THIS AREA. HOSPITALS ARE TO BE FOUND AT KINGS LYNN AND NORWICH
AT SWAFFHAM THERE IS A DAY CENTRE TO WHICH THE ELDERLY AND INFIRM CAN BE TRANSPORTED. THERE THEY CAN BE BATHED AND HAVE THEIR HAIR WASHED AND MEET OTHER PEOPLE.
WE HAVE A GOOD HOME HELP AND THE WOMENS INSTITUTE WORK A ROTA SYSTEM TO DELIVER MEALS ON WHEELS TO FIVE ELDERLY PEOPLE TWICE WEEKLY, COLLECTING THE MEALS FROM NECTON MIDDLE SCHOOL.
